review: The experience was good, visited for stomach pain. Doctor''s behaviour was good, he was friendly. Hospital facilities were comfortable, waiting time was 1 hour. The doctor prescribed some medicines, but personally I can''t get a solution, so I have to change the doctor. This was my first visit, as a physician it was good, my problem was another so as a physician like fever are general issue I can suggest her.

Good experience with the doctor. Visited for my fever, Doctor was listening to my problems, I waited for 5 to 10 minutes for the consultation, hospital facilities are good, am happy with doctors explanation. Treatment was good, the doctor was very friendly, I will definitely recommend the doctor if anyone necessary.

review: Met the doc for general health check up. I was extremely satisfied with the consultation and response  of the doctor in particular and overall the zoi hospital.

Visited for my wife, she was having fever, cough, cold, body pain. Consultation experience was good, the doctor was good, rest apart from front desk team, I asked for the medical certificate they were just ignored to make a certificate saying that we can''t provide you the certificate, we don''t have the authority to provide a medical certificate, except this we are happy the doctor.
